title: The Biology of Cancer 2nd Edition Weinberg c2014 textbook
description:
The Biology of Cancer, 2nd Edition (c2014), a textbook by Robert A. Weinberg.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://www.garlandscience.com/product/isbn/9780815342205" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.garlandscience.com/product/isbn/9780815342205</a>
Table of Contents:
  01. The Biology and Genetics of Cells and Organisms
  02. The Nature of Cancer
  03. Tumor Viruses
  04. Cellular Oncogenes
  05. Growth Factors, Receptors, and Cancer
  06. Cytoplasmic Signaling Circuitry Programs Many of the Traits of Cancer
  07. Tumor Suppressor Genes
  08. pRb and Control of the Cell Cycle Clock
  09. p53 and Apoptosis: Master Guardian and Executioner
  10. Eternal Life: Cell Immortalization and Tumorigenesis
  11. Multi-step Tumorigenesis
  12. Maintenance of Genomic Integrity and the Development of Cancer
  13. Dialogue Replaces Monologue: Heterotypic Interactions and the Biology of Angiogenesis
  14. Moving Out: Invasion and Metastasis
  15. Crowd Control: Tumor Immunology and Immunotherapy
  16. The Rational Treatment of Cancer 


FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF.
